Olivia Nyembezi Muchena (amụrụ n'abalị iri na asatọ n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 1946) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Zimbabwe na onye bụbu Minista nke agụmakwụkwọ dị elu na Cabinet nke mbaZimbabwe. Ọ rụkwara ọrụ dị ka Minista nke Sayensị na Mmepe Nkà na Ụzụ na dị ka Minisita nke Ihe Ndị Ụmụ nwanyị.
Muchena gụrụ akwụkwọ na Mahadum steeti Iowa ma gụsịrị akwụkwọ na PhD na ọrụ ugbo na ụmụaka na mgbanwe mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya na teknụzụ
N'ime ngwụcha Na afọ 1970 ọ bụ onye otu ngalaba na Mahadum Rhodesia Mgbe Muchena malitere ọrụ ya na Mahadum nke Zimbabwe na afo1983, ọ nọ n'ọkwa Deputy Dean na Senior Lecturer
Mgbe ọnọdụ ya dị ka Deputy Dean kwụsịrị na 1985, ọ nọgidere dị ka onye nkuzi ruo na afo 1995.

Muchena jere ozi n'ọkwa dị iche iche na gọọmentị Zimbabwe gụnyere n'Ọfịs Onye isi ala na Ministri Ọrụ Ugbo. N'oge ọ nọ na Ministri Ọrụ Ugbo, ọ na-etinye aka na usoro mgbanwe ala nke Zimbabwe. Mgbe a ṅụrụ ọchịchị ịdị n'otu nke mba ZANU-PFMDC iyi na Onwa Febụwarị 13, na afo 2009, Muchena ghọrọ Minista na-ahụ maka ihe gbasara ụmụ nwanyị.
Na Onwa June na afor2015, Muchena tụfuru oche ya na Senate nke Zimbabwe mgbe ZANU-PF chụpụrụ ya maka ịkwado Joice Mujuru, onye bụbu osote onye isi ala nke Zimbabwe.
E debere ya na ndepụta mmachibido iwu nke United States na 2003.
O nyere aka n'akwụkwọ "Ọ bụ naanị ụmụ nwanyị nwere ike ijikwa ya" na akwụkwọ akụkọ na afor 1984 Sisterhood Is Global: The International Women's Movement Anthology, nke Robin Morgan dezigharịrị.
Muchena enwetala ọtụtụ onyinye gụnyere agụmakwụkwọ site na Africa-America Institute na mkpakọrịta site na Kellogg International.
